entry.title: Ukraine Calls for More Arms, Tougher Sanctions to Fend Off Russia in Donbas
entry.content: Ukrainian officials called for tighter sanctions and more weapons to forestall a looming Russian offensive in the east of the country, as Moscow mobilizes troops there after pulling back in northern Ukraine.

entry.title: Belarusians, Russians Join Ukraine's Military, Hoping for Freedom at Home
entry.content: Hundreds of volunteers from Belarus have joined a dedicated Belarusian battalion since the invasion of Ukraine, while a separate unit staffed by Russian citizens is also preparing to deploy to the front lines.
